text_block_list.text:
Today, the gymnasium at Tracen Academy was filled 
with excitement. And that was because——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Don't rush, keep it slow!

text_block_list.name: Teammate
text_block_list.text: Got it!

As part of class today, a multi-event tournament 
was being held. Duramente was competing in Basketball.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
As expected of Duramente. Being part of that family, she also 
seems to have outstanding talent for competitive sports.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Her position is Point Guard? And also scoring that much…… 
Duramente's stealing the show.

text_block_list.name: Rival Team Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Kuu……we can't just let them keep——Ah!

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Uwaah, what an amazing move……! Seems like this win's 
already in the bag! I wonder how many points they'll win by～!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
…………Fuu. 
——Alright, move up!

Everyone was enthralled by Duramente's plays. 
But for some reason, her expression seemed a little stiff.

text_block_list.name: Rival Team Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Don't let her pass the ball! 
Stop her right here!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer
text_block_list.text: ! No way, from that distance……!?
(——Bang!)

text_block_list.name: Rival Team Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: ——the rebound!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Huh, she missed……? 
W-well, they're still in the lead anyways, do your bestー!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……Sorry! Defense! 
We'll take it back!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: They won! As expected of Duramente-san!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I suppose you could say it was a comfortable victory. 
And the individual scores……We saw something pretty good.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Fuuーー…………

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……! 
Trainer. So you were watching……

She could probably hear the voices from the stands. 
On top of that, the countless expectations placed 
on her must have been weighing on her heavily.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……I can't help but feel nervous. 
And because of that I made a big mistake.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ——You're right.

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text: Ah, there she is! I was looking for you, Duramente-san!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
A reporter who does in-depth coverage. 
After this, I was going to do an interview.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
It was an offer made through our family, 
so you don't need to worry about it. ——Well then

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text:
In the match just now, you were very prominent! 
However, there were some unfortunate incidents.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ——It was just the result of the weakness in my heart.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
This experience will help further strengthen my own mentality. 
So that I can remain calm in any situation.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ——To prove that I am the "Strongest".

Without hiding her own weaknesses, still striving 
to improve herself. Staying strong under pressure——

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text:
To become stronger in both body and mind! With this, we'll have 
high expectations and be looking forward to your future endeavors.

As she continues to struggle through her unease, I want to be there 
to support her through it all……I once again resolve myself to that.
